title: Programs for Arabic font? HELP
content:
Hi everyone,

I've just finished design of arabic font in fontlab. Then I imported it in Volt programe and when it comes to test the font's shapes in Volt, it doesn't show them! (and ofcourse font doesn't work in InDesign e.g.)

Do I need any other programe for it?

Please, help me, I'm almost done :)

Aleksandra
author: Aleksandra2206

comments.content:
Generate the font in the fontlab and select ttf (truetype font) as the output. Then Import the generated ttf font in the VOLT. Otherwise, If you you want to ship the fonts in otf there is instructions for this somewhere written by John Hudson.

B
Could you give me the works of yours? Actually I'm the Arabic Font lover.
